description: ISTJs are practical and fact-minded individuals, whose reliability cannot be doubted.
ISFJs are very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones.
INFJs are quiet and mystical, yet very inspiring and tireless idealists.
INTJs are imaginative and strategic thinkers, with a plan for everything.
ISTPs are bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools.
ISFPs are flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore and experience something new.
INFPs are poetic, kind and altruistic people, always eager to help a good cause.
INTPs are innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.
ESTPs are smart, energetic and very perceptive people, who truly enjoy living on the edge.
ESFPs are spontaneous, energetic and enthusiastic entertainers – life is never boring around them.
ENFPs are enthusiastic, creative and sociable free spirits, who can always find a reason to smile.
ENTPs are smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge.
ESTJs are excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things – or people.
ESFJs are extraordinarily caring, social and popular people, always eager to help.
ENFJs are charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to mesmerize their listeners.
ENTJs are bold, imaginative and strong-willed leaders, always finding a way – or making one.
